name: box-highlight
description: Chrome extension for highlighting boxes on web pages

scripts.zip: npm run clean && cd extension && zip -r ../box-highlight-$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip . -x '*.DS_Store' -x '*/README.md' -x '*/convert-icon.html' && cd .. && echo "Created box-highlight-$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip"
scripts.zip:latest: npm run clean && cd extension && zip -r ../box-highlight-latest.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' -x '*/README.md' -x '*/convert-icon.html' && cd .. && echo 'Created box-highlight-latest.zip'
